full_text: A friend asked me this week if I could knit her a little rainbow heart. She wants to add it to a plain cream blanket she is making for a ‘Rainbow Baby’ I thought this was such a lovely idea - so here is my pattern Size: Width 4¾”, Height 4½” Requirements: Small amounts of Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, Indigo, Violet yarn 3.5mm needles So cute! Perfect for a Rainbow Baby And perhaps for a Pride Decoration too ! To get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓
name: Ravelry: Rainbow Heart pattern by marianna mel
